Display.Other Display Features: Local Contrast Enhancement, During Lack of Light Allows to Dim Display Light so that Eyes Feel Comfortable in the Dark, Saturation and Sharpness of Display, Automatically Optimizes the Colour Range, Adapt Display - Analyses Incoming Lights

Camera.Other Camera Features: Primary Camera: Fast Auto Focus, HDR (Rich Tone) - For Brighter and Vivid Captures, Selective Focus - Treasure Moments in Detailed Focus, Phase Detection AF, Virtual Tour Shot, Video Stabilization

Multimedia.Music Player: Yes, Supports OGA, MID, RTTTL, IMY, OTA, 3GA, RTX, AWB, M4A, AAC, XMF, OGG, WAV, WMA, MXMF, MP3, AMR, FLAC, MIDI
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports MP4, 3G2, ASF, FLV, WEBM, MKV, AVI, M4V, 3GP, WMV

Other Features.Important Apps: S Health, PayPal - Secure Payments with Fingure Swipe, Google Mobile Services - Chrome, Drive, Photos, Gmail, Google, Google, Google Settings, Hangouts, Maps, Play Books, Play Games, Play Newsstand, Play Movie and TV, Play Music, Play Store, Voice Search, YouTube
Other Features.Sensors: Barometer, Hall Sensor, Proximity Sensor, RGB Ambient Light Sensor, Heart Rate Sensor, Gyro Sensor, Compass, Accelerometer, Gesture Sensor, Finger Print Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories
